website_summaries.verdict: If you need a basic lock box with lots of space and a low price, it's a good choice – but keep in mind it doesn't offer any added protection against water or fire damage.
pros: User-friendly features including a strong handle, keyless combination lock, and spacious interior
Lightweight and strong – has steel corners and aluminum trim for added strength
cons: Problems with the lock reported, including components that are too tight or loose, and some that stop working altogether

customer_reviews.title: See photos for best size reference.
customer_reviews.text: Compared its size to a standard water bottle so you can visualize its size. Everyone has a water bottle around the house! Overall, it's a nice little lock box. Go all black on black. The other colors are meh.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to fit my private belongings
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to set up the combination, open/close and carry with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: Lock Sticks and is Easy to Break
customer_reviews.text: The lock continuously sticks and I have had to return one for this issue. The second one had the same issue and I had to break the lock on this one too. Lock is pretty easy to break with your bare hands fortunately. Not good news when you are trying to keep things safe. Not sure why the lock keeps breaking. I have set it correctly. I set the lock then I unlock it with the code. Works the fist time then sticks and does not unlock again. I hope I can return it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I would consider this a childs toy.
customer_reviews.text: This item is good for the price, but if I had to make the decision again I would choose a different lock box. This lock box is very light weight and doesn't like to stay open. When putting stuff in the lock box you must use 2 hands because the lid does not open far enough too stay open. It also came with a dent in the bottom of the lock box even though there was no damage to the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sultana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my kids to keep their wallets and some other items in to keep nosy siblings out. The locks in all three don't work right with the codes we set. One never worked at all and the lock can't be closed, the other two worked once then stopped working and won't open. Thank goodness we hadn't put anything in any of the boxes. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Worthless product
customer_reviews.text: This product was a giant disappointment. Once opened and then closed, the dial stays on your combination instead of scrambling so if you forget to move the numbers, anyone can open it. It is also apparently very easy to break into as the person I was locking stuff up from broke into it no problem. Not sure what they did, but the latch slides open now without a combination. The latch is permanently stuck in the reset position. Worthless product. Do not purchase if you have something you need safe.
customer_reviews.author: SparkleSplash

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Code doesn't work. Should've known better.....
customer_reviews.text: Same thing, followed directions and set code. Worked for 5 minutes and now it won't recognize my daughter's code. Won't open using 000 either. Cheaply made box. One of the number wheels seems to be off track. Should've known better.
customer_reviews.author: Nole97

customer_reviews.title: Secure for all of my meds
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a cosmetic case for 10 years, until the zipper wouldn't work anymore. I'm on many meds for my medical issues, including some that can be abused. I have to take all of my meds to my pain doctor's office once a month for those meds to get counted and tracked. I feel SO much safer transporting my meds in this lock box! Now I don't have to worry about anyone "helping themselves" to any of my meds!
customer_reviews.author: EmBee

customer_reviews.title: Great locking medication box.
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy. Would easily hold a few dozen average sized pharmacy pill containers and filled weekly cassettes for anyone looking to use this as a lockbox for medications. I ordered three as I work with elderly clientele and prepare the medications for three of these clients, this allows me to keep everything secure and organized, I also have a form I cut out and press into the lid to hold the list of medications, dosages, and times, so that I can mark off each time I fill a new cassette. I feel very secure using this for my clients. The combination is easy to set and it opens and closes very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: A good place to hide your weed
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how this product received such bad reviews from other people, but I found it to work wonderfully! Lock worked as expected, no issues with anything. I plan to purchase another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Rocketpants292

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and tweeners
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 daughters who share a room and wanted a 'safe' for some of their keepsakes. I looked around at several different options. For the price, this was the best I found. We had tried the kid safe that was cheap and did not function very well (went straight in the trash after very little use) prior to buying this one. This is a great size for their needs and easy to use but durable enough for almost tweeners.
customer_reviews.author: CPH

customer_reviews.title: You get what youpay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what you get. A box that is secured. The lock works great, but you can tell it is not of a high quality. Then again the price of this item tells you how good it should be. I bought one to keep my medications in. So that no one could get into them. It does serve this purpose. Not recommend for keeping valuables safe. If someone wants to, they could easily get into. Again great, for the price you pay. Light to lift and carry, and easy to store medications inside, with bottles standfting up. I am very happy, with this product. It serves it's purpose. Knowing it's quality I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Phillips Jr.

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE ALL THE BAD REVIEWS! Broke within two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Believe all the bad reviews! This thing looks fine upon delivery, but just like a couple other reviewers have mentioned, the 3rd time I tried to open it the cheap plastic lock component failed and I had to end up smashing it open with a hammer. Buyer beware - this is not the lock box solution you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja

customer_reviews.title: This seemed perfect. There seemed like there was going to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something else to bury my brother's ashes in. This seemed perfect. There seemed like there was going to be a problem in getting this, but in the end it came and it was perfect. The container the ashes were in fit snugly and there was room on the side for mementos. I was so grateful for this. I searched all my area something I could use to no avail. This just meant so much to me.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, doesn't hold up to normal usage
customer_reviews.text: The size of this was right for what I wanted, but it stopped locking after only a few weeks of use. I only opened it once per week, and now the latch won't stay closed regardless of where the combination is set. $20 is not a lot, but it's a lot to just thrown away on junk. I buy about 200 things per year on Amazon, and this is one of the rare times I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred E. Guy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is really a sturdy lockbox!
customer_reviews.text: This lock box is so darned cute And the answer to a lot of prayers! My medication has gotten stolen so many times by people I actually thought I could trust! Turns out NOBODY is trustworthy around my medication! SMH
customer_reviews.author: Riverwitch22

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my meds locked up and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Because I have a lot of medications, due to an illness, I don't like leaving my meds out. So I purchased this to keep them safe. It works perfectly! I say it could hold approx 15-20 prescription bottles, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: You have to get this
customer_reviews.text: There is no negative thing to say about this. I put all my prescriptions and money inside, and I am going to put important papers inside too. just in case we have a Tsunami all I have to do is grab and go. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t steal my snacks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Someone in my office decided to eat the snacks I kept in my desk. At first, it was fine. After a month, I got fed up! So I decided to buy a locked box for my goodies. But not just any locked box. A CLEAR locked box, to show those jerks EXACTLY what they’d be missing out on from now on. I proceeded to get some of the BEST snacks and drinks to keep in there, with a note stating that because they were so rude, I had to lock it all up. Nothing went missing, but the number keys were moved a few times (I always left them on 000 when I went home).
customer_reviews.author: KLeeMagee

customer_reviews.title: Good for deterence and holding
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something to keep your family/friends out of, this will work (Unless they are very desperate). If you are looking for something to hide the Declaration of Independence in it, Nick Cage will steal it with ease. It is sturdy enough hold it's self together with lots of things in it, but it can easily be pried apart. It works great as a opportunistic theft deterrence (provided it is properly secured with something), but don't put stuff in it of high value if you are planning on leaving it unattended in public without some sort of securing in place.
customer_reviews.author: Félix

customer_reviews.title: Functions as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hide my candy from my boyfriend...who just REFUSED to RESPECT my boundaries...men! I am happy to report, it is functioning just as expected. Don’t got overestimating what this box can do, for the price and size, you’re getting exactly what’s described. It’s easy to set and reset the combo, as well as open and use. You do not have to reset a new combo each time, but can as often as you want. For sizing comparison, I can fit 2 boxes of Keebler Grasshopper cookies and two bags of candy, all of which I also recommend. Lololol. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: AEH

customer_reviews.title: Can change code! Great size lock box!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but once your code is found out you cannot change it, meaning the box becomes worthless once someone figures out your code and can always open it. Besides that flaw it's a nice size lock box, it worked great until the code was figured out and now I'm off to buy a different lock box. UPDATE!! So it turns out yes you can change the code! I tried three times and it didn't work so I thought that's that but one more try (by repeating the steps) I was able to change it!! I don't know why it took me so many attempts but I finally changed the code!
customer_reviews.author: Katana

customer_reviews.title: If looking for locked box, keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it two stars for the fact that it is a box, functions as a box and looks like the picture. My complaint is with the locking mechanism. The lock wheels turn with difficulty and it is very difficult to see the numbers on the wheels. With time those numbers will fade making the box useless for holding anything needing secured. Would not recommend for medication security as the lock could be easily broken open. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard box with a broken lock
customer_reviews.text: How do I give something zero stars? This picture (and description) is quite deceiving. I was expecting a small sturdy box with a combo lock. I also didn’t need it to be like Fort Knox- almost anything would have been fine as long as it was secure. It is literally a cardboard box with a cheap lock attached to it. Additionally, the lock did not work properly. I set the combination multiple times and it would “lock” and then all you had to do was push the button with minimal effort and it would pop open.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Keeping things locked down well
customer_reviews.text: We got this to contain items that my husband is not allowed to have access to. It is bigger than we thought, which is nice, and feels like it is well made and will last a long time. The combination lock is easy to set, and to use. The only change I would make would be to have the ability to relock the case while it is open, so that after opening the case, I could change it off the combo so that there cannot be an accidental reveal of the combination. But otherwise I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 3 digits not secure.  overall build is good to keep children out.
customer_reviews.text: 3 digits is not enough combo. 4 would be perfect. we have 2 now, one came with minor dents... one came with scuffs. life happens and these won't look perfect in a month so not sending back for minor cosmetic issues. I think these are part of mfg process and NOT from shipping. these are sturdy boxes though. I'd make 4 digit combo, and make liner optional or no liner. wish vaultz made this material avail for other boxes. I'd like to get a larger version of this.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Great combination safety box
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller version of this item purchased previously but needed a larger one. I live in an assisted living facility where it is required to have all medication in my room locked up and I needed a larger case since several of my medications come in pill packs which didn’t fit in the smaller box, this one is great I can get 10 or more pill punch cards in the case easily and still close the lid. It is lightweight and yet safe so that no one who doesn’t know the combination can get in.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little box 🔒
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to use! Definitely worth the money. I bought this to secure my cat's canned food. He's on a diet so I don't want other family members to give him food when he's not supposed to eat 😹 The box comes with a clear manual on how to set the password, which is extremely helpful. The last thing you want with these things is unclear instructions, thankfully the manufacturer is very smart. I'll probably buy a second box for my household items in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J.U.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is well worth it
customer_reviews.text: The replacement is a godsend. Thank you so much for sending me the replacement after I received a defective product from the seller to which I returned. This slide button that was stuck on another item that is similar to the new replacement I received actually worked. I am so pleased to see that the replacement is well worth the money and time, especially how speedy the seller has responded to help solve my issue with the first item that arrived in excellent condition, but was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Anibeth

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks so cool in person. I just hope the handle and lock last as long as my last one did. I eventually had to break into my old one, hut only after extensive use and abuse. Update: after a collective week of use the handle started falling off on a regular basis. I am disabled and cannot pick up the box by myself when the handle decides to fall off, so this is a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for discouraging siblings
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 8 year old to keep his "valuables" away from his brothers. It would never stop a real burglar from taking jewels, but will keep your slingshot safe from toddler siblings and wallet away from candy tempted 5 year olds. We love that you get to pick the combo. Easy for kids to remember! Really, you could easily break into this if you're really needing to (might destroy the box) so don't keep anything too valuable in it. But it's great for what we need it for! We will probably order some for all the kids! Wish there were more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Strelow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Vaultz has always been good for security, the only brand I buy, unless someone has plenty of time to sit down with your box and struggle for about an hour or two to pry it open with a knife (which I had to do before because I forgot my code once), then this is a great box to lock away your personal things, easy to change the code if you ever need to (requires having the original to unlock it obviously), great size, and a handle for portability, worth it
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY PIECE OF CRAP NO CS #
customer_reviews.text: I cannot overstate what a piece of crap these boxes are. There is no customer service number on the website or anywhere I can find to call and discuss it with someone. The lock mechanism is inconsistent and will not turn or unlock. I bought for expecting quality what a huge mistake. They all work a little differently and have different types of problems so good luck if you’re deciding to buy this product! I would advise to stay away
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great locking box
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what we wanted - a smaller locking box that was deeper than the standard cashbox or lockbox. We needed to store our vape devices and liquid in a safe manner when around children. This box is deep and big enough to store vapers, liquid, batteries and even the charger when we travel. The lock is adequate to discourage small children. This would also be good for medicine to keep it safe from the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Fozwort

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend so I don’t eat all her food when she’s not home. I have one in the freezer for her ice cream, fridge for drinks, and one on the kitchen island for all her room temperature snacks. Edit: I am now stuck with 3 broken vaultz but I managed to return 2 before the return window closed. The problem is the cheap combination lock can be opened even while LOCKED. All it takes is a few weeks of usage and the entire lock mechanism becomes so loose that a child can just pop it open even when it’s locked.
customer_reviews.author: Covfefe

customer_reviews.title: Its mostly cardboard
customer_reviews.text: A good place to store passports, important tax info, and other documents. Cheap materials. Contructed of mostly thick cardboard, i question the durability. If you ever forget your combo, you can simply cut through it i suppose. I'll probably spend some extra coins later on a more secure security nox
customer_reviews.author: antoine

customer_reviews.title: A place for private things
customer_reviews.text: I have 12 grandchildren aged 11 to 18. This year for their birthdays I have starting buying these security boxes. Kids need a place to put private things. Especially if they have snoopy siblings. LOL This is just big enough. I have bought different colors, different patterns. But they have all loved them. The combination is changeable. I think mostly they keep phone chargers, birthday money and such things. But everyone should have a place to keep what is important to them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Landis

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised size!
customer_reviews.text: Both the Amazon description and the card board sticker attached are lies. States: 10x7.75x 7.25,(about 561 cu. inches) Reality: 9.875x7.375x 6.75 (about 491 cu. inches) Considerable short fall. I took one look at it and knew it was smaller than stated. I would sure like to get a look at the measuring device used on this! Can't properly stack my silver bars :) Really. This is just wrong!!! '
customer_reviews.author: D.C.Fresch

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No issues despite reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had any issues with the box at all. I was nervous in purchasing at first based off of some the reviews but it seemed reasonably priced. This box is not a sturdy hard safe box, just meant to keep small items. I’m sure I could break it if I slammed it on the ground but I wouldn’t keep super valuable things in it anyway. I like it and I would definitely purchase another one if anything happens to this one. I got the all black box, as pictured. Love it! Looks very sleek and strong in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things out of sight / out of reach - portable
customer_reviews.text: This works for us. We wanted medications out of sight of anyone in our home (caregivers, children, teens, etc) & harder to get to then opening a medicine cabinet for instance. I'm sure that if someone really wanted to get into this case they could, but it would take some time & afterward the case would be broken...it would be obvious at that point that something much more like a safe would be needed (or even moreso that the people breaking into it needed help)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I specifically needed a locking box that was transparent to use as a cell phone jail. This box was perfect and slightly bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Maryonette

customer_reviews.title: Don't really recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong and the quality is horrible. Used it to keep expensive art supplies like markers and colored pencils didn't really get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Arisleydis

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping people out!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my purposes! Will hold a lot—fan good a few books to give you a reference for size. It is a little light weight which makes me wonder about its durability but as long as you’re not rough on it or keeping heavy weight items in it, it be good. Something to keep in mind, when you open it, the top doesn’t hold itself open. You have to hold the top while getting something out of it, but this isn’t a big deal and doesn’t bother me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Abi C

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lock box. It’s easy to change the code if needed, it’s a good size, and love that there is no key to keep track of. I wish it was sturdier, but it’s plastic so it is what it is. I would def recommend for people that need to keep stuff away from kids, or if family members sleep walk and eat sweets at night and you gotta keep it away from them!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member For Life

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: You can't reset the code on this if you accidentally clear it, meaning you'll have to break into the box to retrieve the items inside. I'm not sure if we cleared the code, or if the mechanism just broke, but after less than 4 weeks of use this broke. Thankfully if was very easy to break into, but if you're looking for a box to provide any kind of security I wouldn't suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so it JUST came a few minutes ago and was excited to use it so I open it and right from the gate I notice it looks used.... There's scratches and some type of substances all over it, but if that wasn't bad enough, I CAME LOCKED!!!! How in the world am I suppose to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Have to be careful w/Lock to make it work
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks nice. Some have written poor reviews because of the lock. You have to be careful w/Lock to make it work. The click as #'s roll into place is very light. If you don't pay attention, it might not work. This is especially true when setting the combination. Make sure the #'s you want are lined up correctly before you set it. 'Almost' in the right spot just will not work.
customer_reviews.author: M. by....

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep the kids out.
customer_reviews.text: Although this box has a lock it is not what I would consider a ‘lockbox’. It’s good to keep the kids out of your ‘personal’ items, but won’t keep a criminal out. A simple flathead screwdriver will pop the lock real quick. The combo was really easy to set and we have not had any issues with it. Perfect to keep those sensitive items away from prying eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: All materials seem to be of good quality and build equally as nice
customer_reviews.text: This box is really built well. Just out of the box, I noticed the quality build. All materials seem to be of good quality and build equally as nice. The box is sturdy and thick, so it seems you can put some weight in this thing. The lock works, but these locks won't deter someone who really wants to get in. That being said, it's easy to use and will suffice for low level security needs. I have to keep medication by my bedside, so I needed something to prevent them from being exposed. This was a great solution. If you need to keep things relatively secured, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: ArnellTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Works well as basic security box
customer_reviews.text: I've never found a fantastic one of these, but this one does the job of making it harder to obtain Rx and OTC meds and sharps. Of course it's not foolproof, and of course a truly determined person could defeat it. We use it, on the other hand, to give a moment's pause and (hopefully) reflection, and slow or derail any self-harming impulses. Numbers easy to roll around, handle sturdy, holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ives

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a two year old out of things!
customer_reviews.text: This exactly what I needed to keep my two year old out of my center console! I can now put my remotes, game controller, and headset inside this, INSIDE my center console. I put Velcro on the inside to hold my remotes inside the lockbox. Then I put Velcro on the bottom of the lockbox so my toddler can’t pull the box out of the couch center console. So far this is working great! Also, instructions ARE included inside the lockbox to set your pin.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not very secure
customer_reviews.text: It bends easily. It might keep a child out. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism always seemed like it was a bit off like it may break any minute. Well 1 year & 2.5 months later, it did break. Now it’s just a box with a handle. But you can’t carry it by the handle now because the lid won’t stayed closed. So I’ll need to buy a new one. Will definitely go with a different maker. Products should last!. Tired of the huge amount of landfill trash created by poorly constructed products.
customer_reviews.author: LaD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The lock doesn't work properly. I have owned various combination locks and lock boxes in the past, so i do know how to operate a combination lock and set them. However this box didn't work. So I can't latch it. If this lock would work it would make for the perfect thing I need. So now I have wasted almost $22 and am still in need of a lock box. I now have to invest in more time and money to find another company that sells these and hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie the Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping things away from kids
customer_reviews.text: This lock box is a good size for keeping our medications and personal items away from curious kids. It won’t keep out someone determined to get in, but it seems like a decent deterrent for kids who are just nosy and trying to sneak without you knowing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY
customer_reviews.text: I was able to change the code to my own. We unlocked it as a test, before we put anything in it. Then my son lost device privileges for 3 days, we were able to open it to put the items in. But when the 3 days were over, the whole family took turns trying to open it. We ended up having to pry it open with a screwdriver. Don't waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I was able to set the combination however the dial doesn’t spin to change the numbers. So, even though the box opens and closes, it is completely ineffective as the numbers always stay on the combination. It looks nice, but that’s about it. Received today, return tomorrow. Basically just a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: SciFi4Life

customer_reviews.title: Lock breaks before long x2
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 of these. First one lasted 4 months and the button flew off and I had to break the lock to get into it. Second one lasted 5 months and I had to break the lock to get into it because the button wouldn't work. That's with using it 1-3 times per week. Not going to try a 3rd.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weir

customer_reviews.title: You know vaultz does out out some great safes But boy they sure got this one wrong 🤡🤡
customer_reviews.text: I had looked and looked for a safe i could put my meds in and feel comfortable they can't get into boy was I wrong sure it opened the first time but when you change the code from there I could never get back in i tried everything even there web site I ADVISE YOU SKIP THIS ONE ITS NOTHING BUT A PAIN IN MY ASS AND WASTED MY TIME TRYING TO CHANGE CODE OVER AND OVER PATHETIC 😡😡😡😡😡😡 DOESN'T GET MY VOTE Kellylove,
customer_reviews.author: Kellylove,

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd Vaultz box, and I’m füçlving FURIOUS.
customer_reviews.text: There’s only one chance to set the combination. If you have a chance to buy this in the stores, where you can test that it’s NEW, that the combo isn’t set, go for it. Instead I’m stuck with a combo of 000. I’ll never buy a VAULTZ box again. That is utterly ridiculous. Ever want to steal something from a Vaultz box? Try to combo 000, and it’ll probably prime itself to give away whatever critical inards it’s supposed to keep for the rightful owner. I can’t overstate how pissed I am.
customer_reviews.author: Hara

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy can not reopen!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the box not even 2 weeks ago opened it to place items in it and now can’t get it to reopen. I’m going to have to reorder another box and break into this one. Truly annoying because I don’t think I’m going to be able to get my money back and return it. The lock will NOT reopen! The box is a great size for what I needed it for tho.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Miriam chadbourne

customer_reviews.title: Simple box, silly lock.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 12 year old daughter who shares her room with her 8 year old sister that gets into everything. It provides exactly the right security to keep an 8 year old out, but not much more. Please don't treat this like a safe. It's little more than locking luggage. If that is what you need, it does the job well and is well-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping little eyes and tiny fingers out of your stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and perfect for keeping kids out of something. If you put your valuables in it, a thief will simply pick it up and take it with them. I keep Kind and Kashi bars in mine, and haven’t had any go missing without my knowledge since I bought it! It has definitely been helpful in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Lacemaker427

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to put my medications in a secure place where my grandsons can't get into. Yet still portable for me. I did want a combo lock instead of a key but the combo lock on this does not move smoothly. It is workable and not a deal breaker for me but a little aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Supsy500

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great for a week, then wouldn't stayed lock. Do not get this, it's a piece of junk. Go to Wal-Mart, same price item better quality and if breaks all you have to pay is gas money to return!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy McCord

customer_reviews.title: Good size for many small items that you want in a secured spot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a big brother to keep his treasures like baseball cards and video games away from little brothers' hands. The combination lock keeps the curious little people in my house out. It is a light box so I think security wise, you might want something sturdier if you are protecting important valuables from thieves but it fit my grandson's need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: V. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box on October 25 2017 by December 30 2017 the combination doesn't work anymore (no I didn't forget it) the box doesn't open and there is no way to reset this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Lock Failed
customer_reviews.text: Lock mechanism failed after initially working fine. Must now destroy latch in order to retrieve items inside before returning. Not convenient. -Michael
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL! locked me out with all my medicine inside and had to break it open.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at first but had to edit my review. After just a couple weeks I was locked out. There was no way I was getting in to get to my medication that I needed. Luckily my husband was near and jimmied it opened with a knife in no time. I was extremely upset at the time and almost in tears before I could find my husband didn't know what to do. This thing is AWFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars, I would
customer_reviews.text: This box is terrible! The box arrived locked already, with damage marks all around the lock area and adhesive stickiness, even though there was no stickers! There were no instructions in the box. The box came LOCKED already! We couldn't close the door of the box, nor set our own code! This is absolutely useless! I wish they sent us a box that actually WORKED!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Box doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Got my lockbox, it is set to 000 but won't open. Contacted the seller who told me to set it to the original combination of 000. Um yeah - that's what is not working for me!!! I haven't changed the code - in fact one of the number dials doesn't even work. It's garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: It’ll keep your stuff secure... from little kids
customer_reviews.text: We got this to hide our valuables from our roommate, but she was literally able to break into it by popping the latch open with a screwdriver. The latch broke, so you can’t pick it up by the handle without it flinging open. The material inside is poorly glued on and separates easily from the side of the box. So, it’ll keep people like ages 5 and under out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika H

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I had this box for one day, I followed all the instructions, put my valuables in the box. The next day I couldn’t get my things out of the box. My combination did not work, I went back to the triple zeros that didn’t work. I was forced to break the lock which was very easy to do, this product is a piece of junk do not buy it you will be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: No way to reset combination.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs, but after 2 months I can't get it to open. The combination no longer works & there is no way to reset or change it. I had to pry it open with a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: R G Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Trust the Lock
customer_reviews.text: I read the directions and watched the video. The numbers were loose on lock. I set the combination, locked it and it open. Put my prescriptions in it and locked it. It would not open. Used a small screw driver to pop the lock. Just good for junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dovie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these. Sent the first one back because it wouldn't program. Second one seemed ok until we tried to change the program for the third time, button locked up and wouldn't operate at all. Sent that one back and went with a different type.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: Lousy lock will jam in time.
customer_reviews.text: This was briefly fun, but after a few weeks, the lock stopped opening. It jammed on one of the dials, and after we got it moving again no longer responds to the combination. Trying to turn the dials is a nightmare. I think I'm going to have to tear the box apart to get my daughter's stuff out - which is possible, because it's just paper. But really disappointing, especially after the time she put in decorating it to suit her.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Broke on my first day. Combination I used for it wouldn’t work anymore and I could not open the box anymore and had to use the butter knife trick on the button to make it open. Box material itself is sturdy enough and at first it was very simple to use when I was able to use the combination and it would open easy but later I came back to open it the box wouldn’t accept the combinationeven though I had Done it many times before?
customer_reviews.author: ItsyagirlCT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this case I keep all my medications in one ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case I keep all my medications in one place plus none of my grandkids can get into it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice box but the lock sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This box is great if you want to keep things in it, unlocked. Like many others, I was able to set the lock, lock and unlock it ONE time, then it would not unlock again. I'd already put my things in it, so I had to work very hard to get it unlocked. It's a defective design.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L Hall

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 of the 3 combination wheels would turn. Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: It looked good. I went to set the new 3-digit combination and the last wheel would not turn so that I couldn’t change it from 0. The third wheel to the lock was nearly impossible to turn when I wasn’t changing the combination. I returned it. Back to looking for a lock box ...
customer_reviews.author: johnbriggs

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT size for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just the cutest personal box! Not sure I would use the lock, but it obviously is there if I ever decide to use it! It was the perfect size to store all my personal goodies, tall enough to store my liquid bottles...I no longer have to worry about someone seeing my goodies, LOL! The best item for the $20 price tag!! Richard S.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. / Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Lock Box
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock box it's deep lots of room to store small items in. I use it to lock up medications to keep away from kids and adults, combination lock works well. Good low price compared to other stores Amazon was cheaper than all the stores combined.
customer_reviews.author: fatima comer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, sturdy construction (although I haven’t really put it through the ringer). Definitely not as sturdy as safe but works well for things you don’t want others to have easy access to. This fits easily under the bed and fits quite a bit inside. The lid is domed so you can fill it passed the brim and still close it.
customer_reviews.author: AllWheelDrive

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with this box. I wish it was a tad bigger. Like maybe one inch wider and one in either deeper or longer. But I love this box. It's sturdy and strong. At locks so I can keep my medicine safe. Don't have to worry about kids and made stealing my medicines anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Lockbox
customer_reviews.text: The box is very durable and a reasonable size to keep on your desk or hid away somewhere. I bought this to keep my school supply's away from my little siblings that love anything with color. It can fix a great deal of thing in the box seeing that it is pretty deep. I would buy again. Be mindful once you set your password there is no going back nd no resetting. Make sure you write down your password and keep it somewhere safe. If you loose your password there is no way to get into the box without destroying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Washington

customer_reviews.title: An adequate box depending on what you're using it for.
customer_reviews.text: It's not hard to tell from the picture that this is just a chunk of plastic. Is it strong? No, I could smash it open on the ground without any tools pretty easily. Now ask yourself if you really care. Would this be a good thing to store firearms/valuables/money in? Definitely not, spend some money and get something that will actually be safe. Do you just want a cheap little box that can keep young kids and snoopers out? Then here's a solid option. It feels cheap and looks cheap, but it has a lock and is about the only cheap thing this size.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure. Perfect for light weight tools.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a tool box to take to work. My tools are all pretty light weight, but they were too heavy for the plastic boxes. Also, I had a problem with coworkers just taking what they needed, and I was unable to keep track of who took what. This box is sturdy, secure, and clear.. Which is a requirement at my work. I would definitely buy this box again, and I will recommend it to everyone at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Vaultz locking storage box.
customer_reviews.text: This is so big, and so pink. Bonus new car smell! This appears to be very sturdy. I love Vaultz as a brand, so I feel confident with this purchase. It would be very hard to travel with like on a plane or train or, God forbid, bus.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for young preteen
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute box and granddaughter does like it, but- it’s not very secure and her sister can easily figure out how to open it. Still a decent box and looks attractive on the dresser or wherever you decide to place It.
customer_reviews.author: Leej725

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous if you use it for firearms.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. I put in combo and it wouldn't open after that. I was going to use it as a gun safe, just something to keep high up and secure. Yes, it's impossible to open, which is great for kids but if you put something in it, like medicine or a weapon, you won't be able to access it to protect yourself if ever needed. The plastic lock broke off and it was just too cheaply made to keep it. I returned it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to tote my knitting around in that was a hard case instead of something like a purse. This fits the bill. I can add my needles and my notions as well. It also comes with a lock which is good as some of my sets are upwards of $400.
customer_reviews.author: runnergirl35

customer_reviews.title: Treasure box
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1st grader, and it’s a total Win. He loves to carry his treasures around, and being able to lock them up is even better. Really durable, has held up to being dragged, dropped, opened a million and two times. Highly recommend, even for real treasure.
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Junk box fail
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions sent with the item to set my combo. Now it wont close. Read alot of reviews on this item after who had the same problem. Good luck if you get this to work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Riki

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this box! I store all my daily meds in here (and there are a LOT). Easy to create combination, sturdy, attractive enough to leave on my dresser (added bonus, it just looks like a makeup holder, so no prying eyes from little ones). I'm going to order a few more to lock up the rest of the meds around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Joan N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size; poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to hold medications, and while its capacity was fine, the locking mechanism either sticks (keeping it locked and impossible to access, even upon resetting the combination) or won't close (making a lock-box for medications meaningless). Wishing we had returned when we had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M Anderson-Clark

customer_reviews.title: No one can take my pills ever again!
customer_reviews.text: Recently a person I know had stollen my pain meds I felt so betrayed! So I purchased this wonderful lock box and now no one can take nothing from me! And its the perfect size for all of my meds! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the little ones out.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has little siblings 3 & 5 and we wanted something that locked and would keep them safe from her meds. This does the trick and allows her to take it between mine and her mothers house easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not solid,good for keeping things that aren't valuable
customer_reviews.text: My dog jumped on it by accident and the top caved in and my dog only weights 12lbs , and it was after the 30 days, should have gotten a replacement I believe it was defective product and then they stopped selling them on subscribe to save, very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Chwst69

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how much I could store in it. The lock is cheaply made and is not that secure. I'm not putting my valuables in it, but it serves its purpose in locking up items that I don't want to leave in plain sight or be to easily accessible to others.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

product_meta.title: Vaultz Combination Lock Box, 7.75 x 7.25 x 10 Inches, Black (VZ00102-2)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackVaultz offers a wide range of fashionable security storage products that allow you to store, transport and protect the things that are important to you. The Vaultz Personal Security Box is great for the general storage of valuables and personal items. It features a combination lock which provides the freedom of keyless security. It is constructed with chrome-steel corners and aluminum trim to deliver superior strength and durability. This conveniently sized box is the ideal place for wallets, cash, passports, birth certificates, CDs, DVDs, and other valuables. The rubber feet on the bottom section prevent skidding and scuffing, keeping your security box firmly in place. If it’s important, play it safe and LOCK IT UP! with Vaultz.
feature_bullets: Locking storage box is ideal place for wallets, cash, passports, birth certificate, medication, prescriptions, pills and other private or valuable items.
Chrome-steel corners and aluminum trim for strength for personal storage security.
Lightweight, strong and durable lock box, and rubber feet prevent skidding and scuffing
Combination lock provides keyless security; NOTE: Check Instruction video for setting up Combination lock
Combination Lock Box is compatible with a double loop tether for additional security. The VZ00595 Double Loop Tether can be purchased separately.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,409 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
